turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, can you order me a drink from Peets?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, which location do you want me to go to?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on 220 Cook St in Lake Geneva.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what drink do you want me to get?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a Caffe Mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what size do want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like it in a medium.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what type of milk should I tell them to make it with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Soy milk, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, do you want whipped cream on it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please but not a lot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I will tell them light whipped cream.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like an extra shot of espresso in it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I can make sure they do that.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks, and can you tell them to go light on the chocolate syrup?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And, one last request is that I need the syrup to be sugar free.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, got it!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: OK, that should be it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, your order is at the store in Lake Geneva. It will be ready for pickup soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, and the receipt will be sent to your phone through text message.
